Uses of Modification in gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.adapters
 

Classes in gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.adapters that implement Modification
 class CopyFromBeans<T>
          Modifies an object by setting its properties equal to the values of the respective properties of a number of supplied beans.
The beans are specified in the constructor.
 class CopyFromMap<T>
          Modifies an object by setting its properties equal to the values specified in a Map object.
 class CopyFromProperties<T>
          Modifies an object by setting its properties equal to the values specified in a Properties object.
 class ReplaceWith<T>
          Modification that checks if the specified value is equal to the value specified in the constructor as replace and if so, it replaces it with the value specified in the constructor as with.
